shri lanka rajaya balaya bedima sambandhayen indiya rajaya wetha laba di athi porondu saha shri lankawe wathman thathwaya pilibandawa indiya agamathiwaraya samanga sakachja karana bawa demala jathika sandhanaya prakasha karayi.shri lanka rajaya, wisheshayen dahathun wani aandukrama wyawastha sanshodhanaya purna washayen kriyathmaka karana bawata indiya rajayata warin wara porondu di athi bawayi demala jathika sandhanaye parlimenthu manthri em.ee.sumandiran ada madhya hamuwakadi prakasha kale.indiya agamathi narendra modi ge aaradhanayen demala jathika sandhanaye niyojitha pirisak brahaspathinda indiyawe sancharayak aarambha karana bawa sumandiran manthriwaraya pawasuweya.balaya bedimaindiya agamathi narendra modi saha widesha amathini susma swaraj samanga sakachcha pawathwa dahathun wani aandukrama wyawastha sanshodhanaya sampurnayen kriyathmaka kota balaya bedima arthawath ayurin sidu kirimata gatha haki kriya salaka balima indiya sancharaye aramuna bawayi sumandiran manthriwaraya pawasuwe.wathman palath sabha kramaya arthawath ayurin kriyathmaka nowana bawayi ohu kiya sitinne.shreshtadhikarana thinduwaudaharanayak washayen sumandiran manthriwaraya penwa denne maha amathiwaraya janatha chandayen pathwa sitiyath ohuta thama palanaya karana palath sabhawe pradhana lekamwariyata upades dimata balayak nomathi bawayi.me sambandhayen idiripath kala mulika ayithiwasikam pethsamak wibhaga kala shreshtadhikaranaya eeta thinduwak laba nodunnath upadeshana athulath nirikshana idiripath kota athi bawayi ohu penwa denne.
